resources_subheading: Welcome to our ever-evolving potting shed of TDF tools, village build updates, subscription packages, news about magical future gatherings, the inner workings of our project, and the small, but oh-so-important legal print. Check back here regularly to watch us grow!
volunteers_page_intro_text: Join our Desert troupe as one of the Special Agents in your chosen area and timeline and become a part of the transformation. Our offering in practice:
volunteers_page_terms_1: Get your desert accommodation costs covered
volunteers_page_terms_2: Spend from 1 to 8 weeks in our desert village
volunteers_page_terms_6: Become a part of the LIOS Labs community
resources_resources_heading: Put the kettle on and get to know us a little better
resources_resources_subheading: Read all about our dream: the mission, vision and how we got here, with our digital papers
resources_faq_subheading: Got a question? We‚Äôre an open source.
stay_title: Visit and study at the School of Ecological Imagination, experience communal living in a unique ecosystem and get involved in something bigger than yourself
stay_meta_description: Visit and study at the School of Ecological Imagination, experience communal living in a unique ecosystem and get involved in something bigger than yourself
carrots_what_1: Spend carrots to get discounted accommodation cost.
carrots_what_2: ü•ï 1  = 1 night off accommodation fee for events or stays.
carrots_what_3: As volunteer you get your accommodation fee off anyway.
carrots_what_4: But be warned... carrots only stay fresh for so long, they do expire after 1 year! So make sure to use them!
carrots_how_to_use_1: Whenever you book an event or stay and have enough carrots to cover the whole accomodation price, you will find this widget on the checkout page. Simply apply discount and that's it!
referrals_subheading: Invite your friends and earn ü•ï carrots
referrals_description_text_1: Invite your friends to join TDF using your unique referral link below and both get rewarded!
referrals_description_text_2: You will receive ü•ï 1 per friend and they will receive ü•ï 2.
referrals_description_text_3: You  are restricted to a maximum of ü•ï 6 per month - which will be refreshed on the 1st of every month.
learn_course_purchase_confirmation_messa:
Dear {screenname},

Thank you for stepping into this shared exploration with us! üåø

Your enrolment marks the beginning of a journey where we'll dive deep into ideas, experiences, and practices that reconnect us with ourselves, each other, and the more-than-human world.

We can't wait to share this process of embodied, playful, and transformative discovery with you.

See you soon! üåæ

With warmth and anticipation,
The School of Ecological Imagination Team üåç
